message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a bit steep at $15000, but I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product like this.
